title: NewYorkCityApartments.com - Union Square - 50+ Listings Updated Daily
posting_body: ['We currently have over 50+ apartment listings in Union Square and the list changes daily.', 'Studios starting at $3650, 1 bed apartments starting at $4000, 2 beds starting at $7000, 3 bedrooms starting at $15,000', "Visit <URL> for today's availability including photos of each.", 'We currently have over 1000+ REAL listings throughout NYC.', 'We have listings in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx & Staten Island.', 'We have listings for luxury doorman buildings, co-ops, brownstones, pre war buildings, furnished & unfurnished apartments and more.', 'We also have the listings to every luxury apartment community in Manhattan.', 'We have listings available now asap, August, September 1 & October, November, December, January 1st.', "Battery Park City, Chelsea, Chinatown, East Village, Financial District FiDi, Flatiron, Greenwich Village, Hell's Kitchen, Little Italy, Lower East Side LES, Meatpacking, Midtown East & West, Murray Hill, Nolita, NoHo, SoHo, Tribeca, Upper East Side UES, Upper West Side UWS, Washington Heights, West Village, DUMBO, Flushing, Bayside, New York University NYU, Columbia University, Times Square, Union Sq, Penn Station, Central Park, Prospect Park, Williamsburg, Astoria, Long Island City, Greenpoint, Cobble Hill, Downtown Brooklyn, Park Slope, Harlem, Gramercy, Roosevelt Island, Mt. Sinai Hospital", "Visit <URL> for today's list."]
